sentences.sentence: I see your cabriolet pass my window.
sentences.translation: 我从我窗口看见您的车子走过。

sentences.sentence: hoping to take the coupe-cabriolet market by storm!
sentences.translation: 这款全新的雷诺似乎要在敞篷跑车市场掀起一阵暴风骤雨。
